title: Plat4 Supp looking for a team
body:
Hey guys,

I am a support main, currently plat 4 and climbing, looking for a team or at least a group of players to frequently hit the rift.

Also happy for duo/trio's

Add me ingame: AgentOfZambino

replies.body: hey man, 4 of us plat+ have recently started up a team and we are looking for support to complete the team. everyones on pretty much every day so add me if ur still looking for a team to play with
